column4: hey guys look i know I dont' need really need antivirus using ubuntu but i'm planning on giving my brother some movies and music and he uses windows so can some one reoccomend a good virus scanner so i dont give him something infected?

hey guys look i know I dont' need really need antivirus using ubuntu but i'm planning on giving my brother some movies and music and he uses windows so can some one reoccomend a good virus scanner so i dont give him something infected?
Xangua no i'm going to continue asking right here if you dont like it go to #eatme
its really messed up that there are so many hall monitors that try to redirect you to different rooms for a simple ubuntu related question just cause the are bored
Suddenly i'm reminded of junior high school
please stop those off topic comments
if you want to use some space of your disk it must be part of a partition and then have a file system
so basically with this 250 gig i want to use for storage best thing to do would be create a 1 gig partition and then format the remaining 249 to fat??
i already have a 60gb external i didnt have this problem with i erased and formatted with fat and it works fine as storage
no, create a 250 gig partition and format it to vfat (or so..)
you didn't remove the partition on that HD

ok may seem a little slow as i'm just learning a little slow but to clear it up the 60 gig was one big partition which is why i could format it. since the 250 had two 125gb partitions and i removed them i naow have to create a single 250 gb partition in order to use it am i correct?
correct - all data must be on partitions that carry a file system
how do i format to vfat? it isnt one of my optinons
